turr-phennir-tie-interceptor-squadron-ol.author: Armada Legacy
turr-phennir-tie-interceptor-squadron-ol.name: TIE Interceptor Squadron
turr-phennir-tie-interceptor-squadron-ol.ability: After you defend, you may ready or recover 1 defense token you did not spend. If you recovered a defense token, flip it to the exhausted side.

maarek-stele-tie-advanced-squadron-old-l.author: Armada Legacy
maarek-stele-tie-advanced-squadron-old-l.name: TIE Advanced Squadron
maarek-stele-tie-advanced-squadron-old-l.ability: After you are destroyed, you remain in the play area until the end of the Status Phase.

iden-versio-tie-fighter-squadron-old-leg.author: Armada Legacy
iden-versio-tie-fighter-squadron-old-leg.name: TIE Fighter Squadron
iden-versio-tie-fighter-squadron-old-leg.ability: While another friendly squadron with SWARM at distance 1 is defending, you may spend a :scatter: readied defense token to cancel all dice.

tomax-bren-tie-bomber-squadron-old-legac.author: Armada Legacy
tomax-bren-tie-bomber-squadron-old-legac.name: TIE Bomber Squadron
tomax-bren-tie-bomber-squadron-old-legac.ability: Friendly squadrons with BOMBER at distance 1 may attack ships while engaged with enemy squadrons.

arvel-crynyd-a-wing-squadron-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
arvel-crynyd-a-wing-squadron-old-legacy.name: A-Wing Squadron
arvel-crynyd-a-wing-squadron-old-legacy.ability: After you are destroyed, you may choose 1 enemy ship at distance 1-3. The chosen ship is dealt a face-up damage card.

braylen-stramm-b-wing-squadron-old-legac.author: Armada Legacy
braylen-stramm-b-wing-squadron-old-legac.name: B-Wing Squadron
braylen-stramm-b-wing-squadron-old-legac.ability: During your activation, after a squadron you attacked suffers damage, you may move that squadron so that it is within distance 1 of its current location and in the play area.

corran-horn-x-wing-squadron-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
corran-horn-x-wing-squadron-old-legacy.name: X-Wing Squadron
corran-horn-x-wing-squadron-old-legacy.ability: Friendly unengaged squadrons at distance 1 of you can attack enemy ships at distance 1 of you using all dice in their battery armament.

horton-salm-y-wing-squadron-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
horton-salm-y-wing-squadron-old-legacy.name: Y-Wing Squadron
horton-salm-y-wing-squadron-old-legacy.ability: While a friendly squadron with HEAVY at distance 1 is attacking a ship, if it has exactly 1 die in its battery armament, it may add I blue die set to an icon to the attack pool. That die cannot be rerolled or changed.

stub-clone-z-95-squadron-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
stub-clone-z-95-squadron-old-legacy.name: Clone Z-95 Squadron
stub-clone-z-95-squadron-old-legacy.ability: After you move, each squadron you were engaged with before you moved suffers 1 damage.

anakin-skywalker-eta-2-actis-squadron-ol.author: Armada Legacy
anakin-skywalker-eta-2-actis-squadron-ol.name: Eta-2 Actis Squadron
anakin-skywalker-eta-2-actis-squadron-ol.ability: When performing a non-COUNTER attack against a squadron, you may spend 1 defense token to add 2 dice of any color to the attack pool.

obi-wan-kenobi-eta-2-actis-squadron-old-.author: Armada Legacy
obi-wan-kenobi-eta-2-actis-squadron-old-.name: Eta-2 Actis Squadron
obi-wan-kenobi-eta-2-actis-squadron-old-.ability: After a friendly squadron at distance 1 spends a readied defense token, you may spend a readied :brace: token. If you do that squadron may ready 1 defense token.

aayla-secura-eta-2-actis-squadron-old-le.author: Armada Legacy
aayla-secura-eta-2-actis-squadron-old-le.name: Eta-2 Actis Squadron
aayla-secura-eta-2-actis-squadron-old-le.ability: When you activate, you may choose up to 2 friendly squadrons at distance 1. Each chosen squadron may increase its speed by 1 until the end of the round.

shaak-ti-eta-2-actis-squadron-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
shaak-ti-eta-2-actis-squadron-old-legacy.name: Eta-2 Actis Squadron
shaak-ti-eta-2-actis-squadron-old-legacy.ability: During your activation, you may spend 1 defense token. If you do, another friendly squadron without DODGE at distance 1 gains SCREEN until the end of the round.

anakin-skywalker-twilight-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
anakin-skywalker-twilight-old-legacy.name: Twilight
anakin-skywalker-twilight-old-legacy.ability: Once per round, after you activate, if you have 6 or fewer hull points remaining, you may toggle your activation slider.

hawk-laat-i-gunship-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
hawk-laat-i-gunship-old-legacy.name: LAAT/i Gunship
hawk-laat-i-gunship-old-legacy.ability: While a friendly non-unique squadron is attacking a squadron at distance 1 of you, you may spend 1 defense token. If you do, it may change 1 die to a face with a :hit: icon.

dgs-047-hmp-droid-gunship-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
dgs-047-hmp-droid-gunship-old-legacy.name: HMP Droid Gunship
dgs-047-hmp-droid-gunship-old-legacy.ability: At the start of the ship phase, you may discard 1 of your defense tokens to place 1 proximity mine token at distance 1.

geonosian-prototype-hmp-droid-gunship-ol.author: Armada Legacy
geonosian-prototype-hmp-droid-gunship-ol.name: HMP Droid Gunship
geonosian-prototype-hmp-droid-gunship-ol.ability: While attacking a squadron at distance 1 of a friendly squadron with GUARDIAN, you may reroll up to 2 dice.

gorgol-nantex-starfighter-squadron-old-l.author: Armada Legacy
gorgol-nantex-starfighter-squadron-old-l.name: Nantex Starfighter Squadron
gorgol-nantex-starfighter-squadron-old-l.ability: After you activate, if you did not attack during your activation, you may spend 1 defense token to choose friendly squadron at distance 1. That squadron may recover 1 hull.

sun-fac-nantex-starfighter-squadron-old-.author: Armada Legacy
sun-fac-nantex-starfighter-squadron-old-.name: Nantex Starfighter Squadron
sun-fac-nantex-starfighter-squadron-old-.ability: After you defend against an attack, if you spent a :scatter: token you may activate as if you were activated by a squadron command (do not toggle your activation slider).

magnaguard-protectors-rogue-class-starfi.author: Armada Legacy
magnaguard-protectors-rogue-class-starfi.name: Rogue-class Starfighter Squadron
magnaguard-protectors-rogue-class-starfi.ability: After you defend against a squadron, if the attacker is at distance 1 of a friendly squadron with SCREEN, the attacker suffers 1 damage. When a friendly squadron with SCREEN at distance 1 suffers damage, you may suffer 1 of that damage instead.

cad-bane-xanadu-blood-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
cad-bane-xanadu-blood-old-legacy.name: Xanadu Blood
cad-bane-xanadu-blood-old-legacy.ability: While attacking a ship or squadron with 1 or more defense tokens, you may reroll any number of dice in your attack pool.

count-dooku-scimitar-old-legacy.author: Armada Legacy
count-dooku-scimitar-old-legacy.name: Scimitar
count-dooku-scimitar-old-legacy.ability: While you are engaged with only 1 squadron, you gain DODGE 2 and you may add 1 die of any coror to the attack pool while attackin a squadron.
